page.title: 02A Typical Day in the Life.
page.content: 06.15:Mum and Dad get up and get dressed,have breakfast and our dog finally wakes up! 06.30:Dad wakes my sister Suzanne and leaves for work. 07.00:Suzanne gets out of bed,washes (usually her hair as well),gets dressed and sometimes has breakfast. 07.30:I get up,have breakfast,then I get dressed and sort my school stuff out. 08.00:Suzanne goes to school,I watch T.V.or play with the dog. 08.30:My friend Angela comes round and we go to school. 09.00:Mum tidies the house and does the washing.I am at school. 10.00:Mum may be still tidying up or she might be cooking. 11.00:Mum might be having coffee with someone. 12.00:Mum cooks and eats her lunch.
